tools.name: search_nodes
tools.description: Search for entities in the knowledge graph by keyword

query.description: The keyword or phrase to search for in entity names, types, and observations

entityTypes.description: Optional list of entity types to filter by

projectId.description: Optional project ID to filter by

tags.description: Optional list of tags to filter by

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

tools.name: read_graph
tools.description: Read the entire knowledge graph structure

includeObservations.description: Whether to include all observations (default: false)

tools.name: create_entities
tools.description: Create new entities in the knowledge graph

observations.description: List of observations about the entity

projectId.description: Optional project ID this entity belongs to

parentEntity.description: Optional parent entity name for hierarchical structures

tags.description: Optional list of tags for this entity
